content:
Unfortunately, there isn't a straightforward way for the Azure AD application owner to send a request or authorization link for the SharePoint owner/admin to click and authorize API permissions.

Typically, the process for granting API permissions involves the Azure AD application owner providing the client ID of the Azure AD application to the SharePoint owner/admin, and the SharePoint owner/admin manually granting API permissions in the SharePoint API management page.

It's possible that a custom solution could be developed to automate this process, but this would require a custom solution developer to create and implement such a solution.
